content: The folders will be permanently removed from the Trash.

comment.text: This text explains the final step in deleting folders, confirming they will be permanently removed from the Trash. It appears within a confirmation dialog when deleting multiple folders, informing the user of the irreversible action. Translators should ensure the tone conveys finality and clarity.

usage.context: <> You are about to move folders ({{ foldersCount }}){" "} to Trash.{" "} {" "} {t("FoldersPermanentlyDeleted")} {t("Common:WantToContinue")} ); } }
